data.title: JADIP
data.meta_description: Definition of JADIP in the Idioms Dictionary. JADIP phrase. What does JADIP expression mean? Definitions by the largest Idiom Dictionary.
data.text:
An initialism of "just another day in paradise," used to express that one's life is proceeding acceptably or as expected. Often used sarcastically to imply the opposite. The abbreviation is only used in writing. A: "Hey, Bill, how R U doing?" B: "Fine, JADIP. How bout U?" A: "Nothing U can do?" B: "Nope. Whole file's corrupted." A: "Wonderful. A month of work, down the drain. JADIP then."
